backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles and admin‑managed promo video portfolio CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining theme CSS variables for light and dark modes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML root file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling all marketing sections, portfolio display, request form, and global theming.
frontend/src/components/CreatedVideosAdm: Admin panel for creating and deleting portfolio items with auto‑generated YouTube thumbnails and field validation.
frontend/src/components/CreatedVideosSec: Displays portfolio videos with loading states, error handling, admin tools, and a viewer for selected videos.
frontend/src/components/CreatedVideoView: Modal viewer showing an embedded YouTube iframe when possible or a fallback thumbnail and external link when embedding fails.
Shows a static gallery of example promotional video thumbnails with titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Renders an FAQ accordion with common questions and detailed answers.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Provides site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with background image, marketing text, call‑to‑action buttons, and quick stats.
frontend/src/components/HowItWorksSectio: Explains the four-step video creation process using icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/IndustriesSectio: Lists supported industries with icons and brief descriptions in a grid layout.
Responsive marketing header with scroll effects, navigation links, logo, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Displays pricing plans with features, highlighting a popular plan and scroll-to-request actions.
frontend/src/components/RequestConfirmat: Shows a confirmation card with reference ID, copy-to-clipboard action, and next-step guidance.
frontend/src/components/RequestPromoVide: Form for submitting promo video requests with validation, controlled fields, and API submission.
frontend/src/components/RequestSection.t: Wraps the request form and confirmation view inside a reusable Section component.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Generic layout wrapper providing consistent section spacing and container structure.
Lists service offerings using cards with icons, descriptions, and a styled section layout.
frontend/src/components/VideoThumbnail.t: Thumbnail component with YouTube fallback logic and placeholder rendering on load failure.
Shows embedded video preview or thumbnail fallback based on URL type and embed capability.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreatePromoVideoRe: Implements a client‑side mutation that simulates submitting a promo video request and returns a timestamp‑based reference ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth status via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolio.ts: Fetches portfolio lists and individual items from the backend actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolioAdmin.ts: Provides admin checks and mutations to create or delete portfolio items, invalidating portfolio queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains deprecated promo video request queries that now return empty results and are disabled.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with cinematic color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, providing QueryClient and InternetIdentity context providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/videoUrls.ts: Parses YouTube/Vimeo URLs, extracts IDs, derives thumbnails, and produces embeddable video URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, features, issues, and requirements for the VlogunrealPromo website, including current known problems and planned functionality.
